publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3324 Linda Fabiani: Gaelic Language Plan—That the Parliament recognises that Gaelic is an integral part of Scotland’s heritage, national identity and current cultural life; welcomes and supports the launch of the consultation on the Scottish Government’s draft Gaelic Language Plan, and acknowledges the work being carried out on the implementation of other Gaelic language plans by Argyll and Bute Council, Comhairle nan Eilean Siar, Edinburgh City Council, Glasgow City Council, Highland Council, the Scottish Parliament and Highland and Islands Enterprise. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*
